item.title: CatchLedger
item.description:
CatchLedger helps you keep activity logs organized without clutter.

Highlights

  • Create quick entries for each catch.
  • Keep lightweight notes for location, date, and details.
  • Review your history in one place.

item.title: Contact
item.description: For support, collaboration, or questions, email us at hello@hambungle.com.

item.title: Privacy
item.description:
Hambungle respects your privacy. We only collect the minimum data required to operate our apps and improve reliability.

If app-specific privacy details differ, those details are documented within the app or store listing.

item.title: Terms
item.description:
By using Hambungle apps and this website, you agree to use them lawfully and responsibly.

We provide our apps as-is and may update, modify, or discontinue features at any time.
